items.itemDescription: Black / Dual sided T-shirt - "Donny & Marie" logo on upper right corner and a 4-full color D&M art image imprint on the back.

2013 Donny & Marie Holiday Tour Program- 40 Donny & Marie image filled pages that cover 5 decades! Highlighting images from The Osmond Archives to the latest images taken in "Donny & Marie Showroom" at the Flamingo in Las Vegas. The program also features the artist's latest biographies and a personal letter to the fans! (8 1/2" X 11" folded size/ full-color).
Full-color 8" X 10" Donny & Marie head shot, matte finish.
Recently released "Donny & Marie" CD, Features the newest songs sung by the world famous brother & sister including "Vegas Love" and "Beautiful Life".
D&M Acrylic Magnet, full-color multi image, 1/4" X 6 square inches.
Donny and Marie silver key chain, lightweight, full-color image from the filming of their latest video "Good Life".
Donny and Marie - 15 oz. Acrylic double wall clear view straight tumbler with purple straw.
Large (17" wide X 13"tall X 4 1/2 deep") Donny and Marie zippered tote bag, 600D polyester tri-paneled design (purple, white and black), reflective stripe and shoulder straps.
Full-color 8" X 10" Donny head shot, matte finish.
Donny Osmond signature embroidered fleece scarf.

50 Years of show business = 50 Pages! Images taken from Donny's personal collection highlighting family & friends AND exclusive images featuring The Osmond Brothers and Donny & Marie show photos, 8x11/Gloss finish.
This LIMITED EDITION single CD  features on the inside cover Donny's personal story behind the song. Bonus Track: If Every Day Could Be Christmas. Perfect for the holiday season!
Full-color 8" X 10" Marie head shot, matte finish.
*SIGNED* Marie new book offers insights on creating a strong family, raising happy and independent children, and, especially, moving forward when it seems impossible to do so.
An Inspirational CD which features (Pie Jesu) Marie's latest passions - Opera! The proceeds of this CD are donated to Marie co-founding charity: Children's Miracle Network Hospitals.
Hot pink click-action metal pen with laser engraved "Marie Osmond" signature on barrel.
